             SessionID sessionId,
             OtrSm.OtrSmEngineHost engineHost)
        Construct an OTR Socialist Millionaire handler object.
        Parameters:
        authContext - The encryption context for encrypting the session.
        keyManager - The long-term key manager.
        sessionId - The session ID.
        engineHost - The host where we can present messages or ask for the shared secret.

    • Method Detail

      • initRespondSmp

        public java.util.List<TLV> initRespondSmp(java.lang.String question,
                                          java.lang.String secret,
                                          boolean initiating)
                                   throws OtrException
        Respond to or initiate an SMP negotiation
        Parameters:
        question - The question to present to the peer, if initiating. May be null for no question.
        secret - The secret.
        initiating - Whether we are initiating or responding to an initial request.
        Returns:
        TLVs to send to the peer
        Throws:
        OtrException
